name: Chainflow
tweet: Momentum is building to #KeepStakeDecentralized on PoS chains. But, it’s critical that we decentralize the infra behind those chains, too. We’re excited to work with our friends @everstake_pool on their new initiative to decentralize one of the most important parts of the stack:

name: Brian Long | Block Logic | Triton One ☀️
tweet: My friends at @everstake_pool are working on some ideas to verify the results from RPC services. Please check it out and share your thoughts. #Solana #RPC

name: Staking Facilities
tweet: Big shout out to @everstake_pool for tackling the task of decentralizing up the #web3 stack While the base layer infrastructure, ie. the nodes powering the #consensus layer, for most #blockchains is already sufficiently decentralized, the rest of the stack, e.g. RPC nodes, isn't

name: Brian Long | Block Logic | Triton One ☀️
tweet: My friends at @everstake_pool are working on some ideas to verify the results from RPC services. Please check it out and share your thoughts. #Solana #RPC
